titles.title: I woke up this morning with heaven on my mind

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I woke up this morning with heaven on my mind
And glory in my soul;
The Spirit of the Lord was filling me,
Making hallelujahs roll.
I feel that I could just run and run
For miles on down that road;
And if you move over just a little bit,
I'll help you carry your load.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
If you move over just a little bit,
I'll give you a helping hand;
Although the way is rough and steep,
Together we can stand.
I know just what you've been going through,
I've been down that same old road;
And if you move over just a little bit,
I'll help you carry your load.
